## Academic History

### 2022-2024: Bachelor of Science at ANU

At ANU I majored in mathematics and minored in physics. I was the top student in third year physics courses in 2023, and graduated with a WAM of 93/100.

### 2025: Bachelor of Science (Honours) at USYD

At USYD I completed an honours in pure maths. 

- My thesis project was titled _Tensor Invariants of Welded Tangles_, and completed under the supervision of associate professor [Zsuzsanna Dancso](https://www.zsuzsannadancso.net/). 

- I was nominated by the school of mathematics for a university medal, and graduated with a WAM of 91/100.
